docs.text: Welcom to Makerdiary Wiki ! Thank you for choosing our products. We have done our best to make it a pleasure to work with them. The Makerdiary Wiki contains technical documentation for our current products and technologies. For information on how to purchase our products, visit our Buy Online page. Get the latest source code and resources at our GitHub repos. Post questions and share experiences with other developers at our Community page. docs.text: Interested in contributing to the developer docs? Want to report a bug? Before you do, please read the following guidelines. Got a question or problem? For quick questions there's no need to open an issue as you can reach us on makerdiary/Community . Community Found a bug? If you found a bug in the source code, you can help us by submitting an issue to the issue tracker in our GitHub repository. Even better, you can submit a Pull Request with a fix. Missing a feature? You can request a new feature by submitting an issue to our GitHub Repository. Be sure that it is of use for everyone. New Issue

docs.text: How to Buy Our Products Buy Online All our items are available on the following channels: Bulk Customization We are ready to customize our electronics and firmware to better meet your solution's needs. Many of our platforms are prepared for customization. If you would like to do some serious business, drop a line and we'll reply before you know it. Email Us
